title: How do I get photos back on my device that somehow moved?
content: I have lots of images downloaded on my phone since I'm a photographer. Keeping the photos on my phone helps me keep track of those I haven't posted on social media. I think I may have accidentally clicked on "free up space." I can still see them in my camera roll but when I try to uploading photos using Instagram, they aren't in the camera roll because they're not "saved to the device." Is there a way for me to get these photos back on my device without downloading hundreds of photos to my device again?
